text: Hi Aarav, I noticed you missed a few classes this month. Can you tell me why?
I understand that personal issues can arise, but it's important to prioritize your education. Have you thought about making up the missed classes?
Yes, I plan on attending the makeup classes next week.
That's great to hear, Aarav. Keep up the good work.
Hi Aarav, I noticed you missed a few classes this month. Why is that?
Hi ma'am, I've been struggling with some mental health issues and it's been hard to attend classes regularly.
Well, you just have to push through it and show up to class. Your education is important.
I know, but it's not that simple. I really need some support right now.
Sorry to hear that, but as your mentor, my advice is to just keep attending classes. That's the best thing you can do.
